# Commit Message Template

- Reference the [Instruction Manual](docs/InstructionManual.md) for all major changes.
- Briefly describe how this commit aligns with the projectâ€™s mission, values, and technical directives.
- If applicable, reference a task from [docs/TASKS.md].

Example:

feat(production-pipeline): Add AI transparency modal

- Implements modal per [Instruction Manual] section 2.3
- Ensures clear UI and transparency for AI-generated content
